description: The Tier 2 Underutilized Property Report contains only underutilized properties that are suitable for divestment by the State of Oklahoma.  Properties located within a campus or with deed restrictions, reversion clauses or located within a campus do not appear in the Tier 2 Underutilized Report.  Properties with future plans for utilization, generating an income, used in support of the agency mission or with environmental issues that make them unsuitable for divestment are excluded from the Tier 2 Underutilized Property Report.   Underutilized properties are defined as buildings, facilities, and land that were reported as being utilized 50% or less.

metadata.attribution: The Office of Management and Enterprise Services

name: 2013 Report of Underutilized Properties-Tier 2
